KTM.locationDescription: Student can go to KL town area by taking MRT to famous spot in KL like Pavillion, TRX Mall and other mall which are accesible by MRT/LRT

TTS.locationDescription: Student can find cheaper room in TTS if they decided to stay off campus. But the transportation is either walking, self-driving or taking bus

LOTUS.locationDescription: Bus will drop students by lotus first then will drop student by setia ecohill

IOI City Mall Putrajaya.locationDescription: The multi award-winning IOI City Mall, located within IOI Resort City, is the largest mall in Malaysia. The mall is also home to an Olympic-sized ice-skating rink – “Icescape” and a 52,000 sq. ft. adventure park – “District 21”.The mall also features IOI Sports Centre, the only world-class sports facility of its kind within the vicinity of Putrajaya, with a total of 15 badminton courts and two covered futsal arenas.

TBS.locationDescription: A description about Terminal Bersepadu Selatan (TBS).

KLTC.locationDescription: The Kuala Lumpur Teaching Centre (KLTC) is located in Chulan Tower on Jalan Conlay within Kuala Lumpur city centre. Certain postgraduate programmes such as applied psychology, business and management, and education are delivered here.
